item.description:
Subject to good weather, let's try Keney Golf Course in Hartford. A few of our members recommended it. Please check back on Saturday morning after 9am for any updates.

The 18-hole "Keney" course at the Keney Golf Course facility in Hartford, Connecticut features 5,969 yards of golf from the longest tees for a par of 70 . The course rating is 68.2 and it has a slope rating of 118. Designed by Devereaux Emmet, the Keney golf course opened in 1927.

I'm not sure if this is up to date but one website showed fees as 14.50 for residents and 17.00 for non-residents for 9 holes.
item.name: Keney Golf Course - 9 Holes
